name: The Twisted Forest
description: The Twisted Forest is a puzzle-platformer where Timmy, an 1800s peasant, must find a healing tea for his grandmother in the Twisted Forest. He has angels that help him along the way, but he has to skillfully maneuver around demons that try to kill him. As he avoids falling into the abyss, he can flip the world on its head, instantly switching demons and angels
